Input

flushKeys View Source

Blocks until all keys are released.

getKey View Source

Returns the currently pressed key code, or zero if no keys are pressed.

Outputs

A

Key code

waitKey View Source

Blocks until a key is pressed, then returns that key code.

Outputs

A

Key code
